content.name: content.yaml
content.value:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: basic-deployment
  namespace: default
  labels:
    app: basic-deployment
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: basic-deployment
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: basic-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: basic-deployment
        image: ssmay0/simple-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
